byline.original: By JACQUES STEINBERG and ADAM LIPTAK

abstract: The Times's Supreme Court correspondent reflects on the latest chapter in the debate on the constitutionality of affirmative action in college admissions.
snippet: The Times's Supreme Court correspondent reflects on the latest chapter in the debate on the constitutionality of affirmative action in college admissions.
lead_paragraph: In the latest Sunday Review, The Times published a news analysis by Adam Liptak with the headline, "College Diversity Nears Its Last Stand."

headline.main: Questions for The Times's Adam Liptak on the Future of Affirmative Action
